bioconda.name: discosnp
bioconda.license: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0
bioconda.summary: reference-free small variant caller for short read sequencing data

biocontainers.name: discosnp
biocontainers.summary: This software is designed for discovering single nucleotide polymorphism (snp) from raw set(s) of reads obtained with next generation sequencers (ngs).

biotools.summary: This software is designed for discovering Single Nucleotide Polymorphism (SNP) from raw set(s) of reads obtained with Next Generation Sequencers (NGS).

bioschemas.name: DiscoSNP
bioschemas.summary: This software is designed for discovering Single Nucleotide Polymorphism (SNP) from raw set(s) of reads obtained with Next Generation Sequencers (NGS).
